lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give
lender.occupational_info: I sing, dance, and act in a Broadway show in New York City & I have my own company that I am building for actors.

lender.name: Berni
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of hope, hard work, and offering a hand up. Around the world, women have an especially difficult time raising capital and obtaining the support they need. If I can help a little, it is an honor and I wish them every success. I know they will pass the gift on.
lender.occupational_info: After my father died, I quit working full-time and returned to college. I hope to soon obtain my degree in women's studies and a minor in psychology. My parents left me a small inheritance and I am taking a bit of that to help others through KIVA.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the universe

lender.name: Team Gassim
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others live and have hopes to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Abdikarim Gassim. I'm a Family Worker by a profession. These are my two wonderful, kind and caring boys, Wehlie and Kaled and my wife & partner for life, Sadia. They are here to help me help others succeed in life.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I have been helped along in my life and believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have been homeless in the past or who are homeless now, and who want to move on into appropriate accommodation. For some people this means renting an apartment on their own, and for other people it means supported living in a group home.

lender.name: Steve, Jane, and Phil
lender.loan_because: We are grateful

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is a fantastic way to connect people, make a difference and foster cultural exchange!
lender.occupational_info: Operations Manager for a cultural exchange company that sends US high school students to study in more than 40 international destinations.

lender.name: Richard Bandelin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for others.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to give help directly to people who are trying hard to improve their lives. It feels good to try and make a difference in someone's life, and I think Kiva is a great organization. I admire all the people who are trying hard to improve their lives by being entrepeneurs and they all need our support. I feel very privileged to be able to do something and contribute to the Kiva program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a buyer for a company that imports art supplies into the US. We buy paint, paper, pastels, brushes, etc - anything that artists use. I enjoy this work because we are making products available for artists to create and produce art, which I think is a very important for the world.

lender.name: Martie
lender.loan_because: I have been greatly blessed and want to help others reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and share my passion for treating all people with kindness.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair computers and networks

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: My life has been full of opportunity due to the trust and encouragement of others. I would like to make opportunities possible for people around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Linux: a piece of software that makes computer devices big and small work. Linux is on the servers that make the Internet possible to cell phones that connect people around the globe.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
I travel all over the world taking pictures and writing articles and books.
It is a wonderful opportunity to meet people across the globe: people who are so similar and gracious, regardless of country, background, or religion.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: Microloans is a meaningful way of helping people across the world.

lender.name: Michael & Pamela
lender.loan_because: Because we feel very fortunate to have all that we do and enjoy helping others to prosper also.
lender.occupational_info: We are both higher education faculty. Michael as a museum administration professor and Pamela as a librarian at the local college.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: It is satisfying to see people succeeding at their own small businesses and knowing that I had a part in their success.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to make global difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults with varying disabilities in residential settings, striving for them to be active participants in their lives.

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: it is a way i can help people who need it
lender.occupational_info: we protect land so that there is open space, farmland, forests, wildlife habitat, parks, beauty, and clean water in the future and forever.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: So little can make such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers about technology.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Labor of love far more than money.

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: I think the investment makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching and research.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the engine of economic growth - and economic growth is the key to alleviating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students economics.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: years ago someone loaned to me,... I'm paying it forward
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses use Google technology to get things done faster and easier.

lender.name: Jessica&Bryan
lender.loan_because: we would like to help someone achieve their dream. Also, we know that raising a child (or children) on a small income can be difficult and we hope to help someone be able to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: Bryan teaches people to scuba dive in the Gulf of Mexico and travels to many exotic locations to dive as well. Jessica stays home to raise their two-year-old son and manage the household.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: There is little I can do to give back for the blessings in my life, but this is one way I can do my small part.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hairstylist and esthetician. I have owned my own salon for 34 yrs. Someone took a chance on me... now it's my turn to pay it forward.

lender.name: Angelo
lender.loan_because: I'm able to help maximize the potential of individuals who need it.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I buy materials, arrange contracts, organise the transportation of people and materials in the oil and gas industry around the world.

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: It's important.
lender.occupational_info: I help sick people.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in people's lives
lender.occupational_info: I actually work in an office at a museum (on a computer all day), but I am continually pursuing my interests in anthropology (the study of human evolution and culture)

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I really believe hard working people who are given a chance can make a long lasting difference in their communities and the lives of those around them.

lender.name: Molly and sons
lender.occupational_info: I am a public-school science teacher. My students are 11-12 years old.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Although I may be considered poor by American standards, I still have nice clothes, a nice place to live and I never have to worry if I'll have enough to eat. I even have luxuries like a car, video games and internet access. I feel I have more than enough and I want to share that with individuals who work much harder than I have to just to afford their basic needs.
lender.occupational_info: I keep things running smoothly to ensure a good entertainment experience for our customers.

lender.name: Delilah & Duke (above)!
lender.loan_because: convenient, hassle-free opportunity to positively impact our world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: Hard work, lots of brain power.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping people.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: it helps someone.

lender.name: Murf
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in parts of my life, I feel i need to share my good fortune with someone who has been unlucky.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying International Relations and Reconciliation Studies in university

lender.name: Mike & Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Barbara's job involves working as a regulator to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Mike owns a site development company ( Mike likes to describe himself as being a ditch digger).

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Interested in helping others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Making healtcare products to save people's lives

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want my charitable giving to go to where it can make a real difference, not line the pockets of the industries that are causing the problems in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell environmentally friendly cleaning products like cloths that clean with just water, so people will stop using chemicals to clean.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: D.J. tells me to.
lender.occupational_info: Study a lot and hopefully help people, somehow or other. In medicine.

lender.name: Kenji
lender.loan_because: The world doesn't change in one giant instance; it's millions of seemingly small acts that can drastically change the outcome of the future.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I love to help people, and make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I use recreation and outdoor activities to help young people develop life skills; self esteem, teambuilding, leadership and confidence

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: Its important to me help someone help themselves. Much more important that just giving someone money, loaning to a deserving person lifts up their livelihood and their spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help sales professionals negotiate with large businesses and government agencies.

lender.name: Keara
lender.occupation: Branch Manager of Cambodia Angkor Real Estate

lender.name: Katharina
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to improve their lives. I am excited about their commitment to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am distributing the Light-Life Technology, my husbands invention, to help reduce air pollution and improve peoples quality of life.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ gives without asking for anything in return, but our hearts.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people through exercise and movement how to help decrease pain in their spine.

lender.name: Michael Lindahl
lender.loan_because: People around the world need help, by loaning them money they can have a steady source of income to support their families. I loan my money to American companies (through stocks), so why shouldn't I help those in need around the world too? Don't ask God why is he letting poverty and other terrible things happen, ask yourself why you are letting it happen. We are the hands, feet and body of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student attending Whitworth University. I have a personal goal of lending my money through Kiva before I spend it. I founded lindahl studios LLC, which also has a mission to lend to entrepreneurs through Kiva.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a break and if I can be of help it will be an honor to assist.
lender.occupational_info: I manage teams of engineers and technicians installing unified communications system (voice,data and video).

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I feel the best way to help someone is to enable them to do what they love.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Microsoft writing software that tests software.

lender.name: Elvis
lender.loan_because: I believe in responsibility and at the same time assisting someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Travel and visit many parts of the world.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I know its a small way I can help others!

lender.name: Callum and Heather
lender.loan_because: It makes sense!

lender.name: Kerry & Isaac
lender.loan_because: We have seen the difference a small amount of help can make.
lender.occupational_info: Kerry- Provides help to adults with developmental disabilities. Isaac- designs video games

lender.name: umeko
lender.loan_because: atriums need to help atriums
lender.occupational_info: one of the oldest professions in the book. and NO, not that one.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful to have received a gift certificate from a friend who introduced me to KIVA. I loan because I want anyone who has a dream that can change their/our world should be given the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.occupation: Womens networking community and resource center

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is to struggle financially and to want to become independent. I think it was great to be given a helping hand that was not charity and would like to do that for somone else
lender.occupational_info: I own my cleaning business and clean houses for people in my local area. Its a small business, just me working for myself.l

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others and I am in business myself
lender.occupational_info: I work with mainly women to help them take charge of their lives, feel better emotionally and in many cases lose weight!

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to help, even if it's a little. Sustainability is everyone's duty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 26 11 year olds in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada. We focus on sustainability in my classroom: personal, social, environmental, and economic.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that the same funds can keep on circulating, helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I look after the accounts for small businesses. in Australia we have a complicated tax system which makes doing accounts very time consuming.

lender.name: Bernie & Liz
lender.loan_because: We'd love to help someone get their business started.
lender.occupational_info: I help people figure out how to invest their money to suit their best needs.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupation: Public Access TV Station Program Coordinator

lender.name: Wesley Fryer
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs working to support themselves and their families worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator, author, digital storyteller, husband, and dad. I'm here for the learning revolution.

lender.name: Sibbing Family Laburnum
lender.loan_because: Its a great opportunity to actually start making things better in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Help other businesses with graphics, printing and websites.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to do it, and because I admire people who have the vision and drive to change their lives. I especially want to help artists and musicians, and creative women of all types.
lender.occupational_info: I am an animation historian. I teach courses at an arts institute, I write books and essays, and I publish a journal on animation.

lender.name: Evelina
lender.loan_because: I can and it helps people to become independent!
lender.occupational_info: My work focuses on ensuring quality, safe health care systems

lender.name: Geof & Dalia
lender.loan_because: We want to help people to help themselves and become independent.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We are all family....
lender.occupational_info: Finding permanent, safe, loving homes for abused and neglected children.

lender.name: Maureen and Stephen
lender.loan_because:
When I was younger, we wrote and received letters from children that my parents sponsored Internationally through Foster Parents Plan (now Plan International). At Kiva, the Helen Rahe Memorial Team continues her spirit of giving: 103 loans and counting!
http://www.kiva.or/team/helen_rahe_memorial

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: Because it's the next right thing to do. I love this site!
lender.occupational_info:
I'm an amateur hermit :) I read too much, study Koine Greek, play violin, draw, and play computer MMOs. œÄ > cake!
"To live is to slowly be born." Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry (Wind, Sand and Stars / Terre des Hommes)

lender.name: Cherry
lender.loan_because: It's a much better use for my money than some of the really stupid things I've spent money on.
lender.occupational_info: I help people put their businesses and organizations on the web so others can learn about them.

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: Money's not useful if it isn't used to improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I press keys and bits happen.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: empowering others to realize their objectives has a ripple effect that can promote the development of even more people
lender.occupational_info: I work in an international school in China educating the children of expatriate business men & women.

lender.name: evetrapeze
lender.loan_because: This is a better investment in the world than any investing with Wall Street. We as a world community are only as strong as our weakest link And the King will answer and say to them, ‚ÄòAssuredly, I say to you, inasmuch as you did it to one of the least of these My brethren, you did it to Me. Matthew 25:40
lender.occupational_info: I am a Circus performer I dance in the air on a rope swing doing daring tricks and poetic movements. I do not work at a job because my partner makes enough money to support the family

lender.name: vlad
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I think people should be good
lender.occupational_info: I run 3 small treatmentplaces for young people

lender.name: Brett Alegre-Wood
lender.loan_because: To give back to the commmunity and help those that are prepared to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Property Investor and Educator.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: ... it is essential and it makes a difference ...
lender.occupational_info: priviledged

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I just want people to have as many opportunities for advancement as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I was working in Manhattan, NYC for a stock exchange...computer stuff, i was just recently laid off and now i'm quite comfortable, while enjoying my time off at home, during the holidays.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm not working at the moment.

lender.name: farhat
lender.occupation: doind job in Pakistan Revenue Automation Ltd

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: it brings positive change to people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I operate an small hotel in Germany.

lender.name: Olivieri
lender.loan_because: Christmas gift
lender.occupational_info: Responsable

lender.name: Vacations Kenya
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We organize custom vacations/holidays for people from all over the world interested in visiting East Africa especially the magnificent Kenya.

lender.name: Harsh
lender.loan_because: I encourage and appreciate entrepreneurial spirit and I think micro loans are the answer to alleviating poverty and generating employment in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a product engineer, a teacher and an UN volunteer who wants to do my bit in achieving the millennium goals.

lender.name: Peder
lender.loan_because: I think there's too much materialism in my world. I am not a rich man, but I want to help people without the same possibilities as me.
lender.occupational_info: My work contists of building houses and office buildings, and i also work as a snowboarding instructor during the winter.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world should have the opportunity for prosperity and live a more quality life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical devices to physicians and medical providers.

lender.name: Nor Ainah
lender.loan_because: lovely idea...empowering the "have" and the "have not" towards a common good.
lender.occupational_info: Specializing in Intellectual Property and Knowledge Management

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I¬¥ve always worked in helping proffessions such as healthcare, but recently had a baby and am now a stay-at-home mom, so I wanted to help a fellow human being across the globe in a different way. Helping others is such a big reward in itself.
lender.occupational_info: Assistant nurse, at present homemaker.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.occupational_info: Producing synthetic dna in a biotechcompany

lender.name: Bartleby
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and in their hard work and dedication. I think each of us has intrinsic value that is expressed through their family, their love, and their work.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with their insurance needs by advising them on how best to protect their assets by providing an additional level of financial security in their day to day live.

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because:
Quiero hacer el mejor uso posible del dinero obtenido por publicidad en mi presencia en Internet.
El concepto Kiva me da la posibilidad de reutilizar este dinero una y otra vez para ayudar a emprendedores que, como yo, se dejan la piel en su empresa.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I've had a helping hand to get where I am today, so it makes sense to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school, and I am also a musician.
